Santa_Rosa.Rohnert Park Stadium: Rohnert Park Stadium was a stadium in Rohnert Park, California, located at 38.35241°N 122.72193°W﻿ / 38.35241; -122.72193. It was primarily used for baseball, and was the home field of the Redwood Pioneers and the Sonoma County Crushers minor league baseball teams. It was built in 1981 and held 4,150 people.
